extension.description:
Kodi addon for accessing live TV channels from various romanian online platforms.
Supported platforms: - DigiOnline.ro - voyo.protv.ro - tvrplus.ro - primaplay.ro
For each supported platform, user registration and login credentials are required in order to access the media content.
Visit https://www.digiromania.ro for more details. Visit https://voyo.protv.ro for more details. Visit https://www.tvrplus.ro for more details. Visit https://www.primaplay.ro for more details.
extension.disclaimer: The author is not connected to or in any other way affiliated with Kodi, Team Kodi, the XBMC foundation or any of the online platforms used by this add-on.
